cooldown.description: Find out when you can submit again.

howto.description: Print instructions for using the common queue commands.

ping.description: Ping my host server to check latency.

sr.description: Submit a song to the queue.
sr.name: sr

url.description: A song link from a supported platform
url.name: url

version.description: Display the bot's current codebase version.

video.description: Reply with the video title and duration.
video.name: video
